snippet: The large and growing field of Republican presidential candidates and potential candidates is largely in agreement on foreign policy, so the hopefuls are looking to domestic and social issues as a way to differentiate themselves.
abstract: The large and growing field of Republican presidential candidates and potential candidates is largely in agreement on foreign policy, so the hopefuls are looking to domestic and social issues as a way to differentiate themselves.

headline.main: Lindsey Graham and Scott Walker Stick to Domestic Issues on Sunday Shows
